title: Cultural Value Internalization and Realization Assessment Tool Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of cultural values
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability to apply cultural values in everyday situations through science curriculum integration

learning_goals: Learners can explain seven cultural value elements (achievement, confidence, creativity, respect, discipline, national perspective, tolerance).
Learners can provide at least three examples of applying cultural values during science experiment tasks.
Learners can diagnose their level of cultural value internalization using a 5-point scale through self-assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
